description:
Empowered by his brother’s determination, Lyfia’s faith, and the Odin Robe, Aiolia, with Odin’s sword and Draupnir in hand, faces off against Loki! The ultimate battle reaches its climax - Aiolia’s fist vs. the Spear of Gungnir – who will take victory?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Sacred Spear of Gungnir Reborn!
誕生! 神器グングニルの槍
